description: Digitized partition numbers: numbers with (weakly) increasing digits ordered by sum of their digits then by the numbers themselves.
comments: a(97) cannot be written in decimal since it requires ten to be written as a single digit.
crossrefs: Number of values of a(n) with a digit sum of k is A000041, number of values of a(n) with a digit sum of k and m digits is A008284, a(A000070(n))=n+1 written as a single digit, a(A026905(n))=A000042(n).
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 14 2001
